channel.title: R on Liga de Políticas Públicas UFSM
channel.description: Recent content in R on Liga de Políticas Públicas UFSM

item.title: Mapas com geobr
item.description: Blablabla Pacotes necessários library(tidyverse) library(geobr) library(ggthemes) sm<-read_municipality(code_muni = 4316907) escolas<-read_schools() escolas<-escolas %>% filter(name_muni == "Santa Maria", abbrev_state == "RS") ggplot()+ geom_sf(data = sm, fill="#2D3E50", color="#FEBF57", size=.5)+ geom_sf(data = escolas, color = "orange")+ theme_minimal() Com leaflet library(leaflet) library(leaflet.extras) sm<-read_municipality(code_muni = 4316907) escolas<-read_schools() escolas<-escolas %>% filter(name_muni == "Santa Maria", abbrev_state == "RS") leaflet(escolas) %>% addTiles() %>% addCircles(popup =~paste("<B>Nome:</B> ", name_school, "<br>", "<B>Dependência Administrativa:</B> ", admin_category, "<br>"), label = ~name_school, opacity = 1, weight = 8) htmltools::includeHTML("map.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
